channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 08:30 Attention! Drone-Kamikadze Dronovian attack
item.description: 🟠 08:30 Attention! Drone-Kamikadze Dronovian attack This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 08:15 Return the threat of artobstil in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community.
item.description: 🟢 08:15 Return the threat of artobstil in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 07:51 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
